maqras.text: 18|99|geunal hananim-eun geudeul seologa padowa gat-i seolo gyeogdolsikil geos-i myeo teuleompes-i ullimyeon hananim-eun geu deul-eul dasi moige halila
18|100|geuttae geunal hananim-eun bulsinjadeul-ege jiog-eul boyeojulila
18|101|ittae geudeul-ui nundeul-eun gali wojyeo naleul yeom-wonhaji moshago deudji do moshanola
18|102|bulsinjadeul-eun naega anin nauijong-eul guwonjalo chwihalyeo saeng-gaghaneunyo sillo hananim-eun bulsinjadeul-ui jugeoji losseo jiog-eul malyeonhayeossnola
18|103|illeogalodoe hananim-i neohui ege geudeul-ui haeng-wilo sonsil-i gajang keun jaleul illeojuliyo
18|104|ideul-eun geudeul-ui haneun il-i seonhaeng-ila saeng-gaghamyeonseo hyeonse-ui salm eman nolyeoghadoda

18|105|geudeul-eun junim-ui malsseumgwa junimgwaui mannam-eul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ini geudeul-ui ildeul-eun muwilo kkeutnal geos-i myeo simpan-ui nal hananim-eun geudeul-ege amuleon gachido duji anh-eulila
18|106|geugeos-i geudeul-eul wihan jiog-ui bosang-ila ineun mid-eum-eul geoyeoghago naui malsseumgwa naui seonjijadeul-eul jo longhayeossgi ttaemun-ila
18|107|geuleona mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun ideul-eun gajang nop-eun cheongug-eul ga jil geos-ila
18|108|geulihayeo geugos-eseo yeongsaengha ni geudeul-eun amuleon byeonhwaleul balaji anhnola

18|109|illeogalodoe badaga junim-ui malsseum-eul giloghagi wihan ingkeula han dahaedo junim-ui malsseum-i dahagi jeon e geu badaneun malla beolil geos-imyeo man-il hananim-i bada hanaleul deohan da hayeodo geuleohalila

18|110|illeogalodoe sillo naneun neohuideulgwa ttoggat-eun han ingan-ina danji sin eun dan hanbun ppun-ilaneun gyesiga naege naelyeoss-eul ppun junim-eul mannagoja wonha neun janeun seon-eul haenghago junim-eul gyeongbae hal ttaeeneun eoneu mueosgwado biyuha ji malla hasyeossneunija
19|1|kapeu ha ya ain swadeu
19|2|igeos-eun geudae junim-ui jong jaka lia-ege bepul-eojin eunhyee gwanhan eongeub-ila
19|3|bola geuneun eunmilhi geuui ju nim-eul buleudeola
19|4|geuga malhagil juyeo jeoui ppyeodeul eun heoyaghayeojigo meolineun baegbal-i doeeossnaida jeoneun junimkke giwonhayeochugbogbadji anihan jeog-i eobs-eossseubnida
19|5|nae hue ol nae chincheogdeul-i haenghalgeos-i dulyeobnaida je anaega bul-im ioni dangsin-eulobuteo han sangsog-in-eul juobsoseo
19|6|geulihayeo jeoui daeleul isgo ya gob-ui gagyeleul isgehayeo jusigo ju yeo geuleul dangsinkkeseo manjoghasineun ja lo hayeo jusoseo
19|7|jakaliayeo hananim-i neoege adeul-ui sosig-eul julini geuui ileum eun yohan-ila geu ileum-eun eoneu nu guegedo juji anihaessdeon ileum-inila
19|8|ittae geuga malhagil juyeo jega eotteohge aileul gajil su issgessseubni kka jeoui anaeneun bul-im-imyeo jeoneun imi nosoehayeossseubnida hadeola
19|9|geubunkkeseo ileusigil geuleohge doelila neoui junim-i malsseumhasa geugeos eun naege swiun il-inila hasyeoss-eumyeo naneun imi ijeon-e jonjaechi anh-assdeon neoleul changjohaji anihaessdeonyo
19|10|geuga juyeo jege geu yejeung-euljuobsoseo lago malhani junimkkeseo ileusigil geu yejung-eulo nega geonjeon hamyeonseodo sam-ildong-an salamdeul-ege mal-eul moshalila
19|11|geulihayeo geuneun yebaedang-eseo geuui baegseong-egelo naga achim jeonyeog-eulo hananim-eul chanmihala geudeul-ege sonjis-eulo malhadeola
19|12|yohan-iyeo i seongseoleul dandanhi jikila hananim-eun geuga eolyeoss-eul ttae geuege jihyeleul jueossnola
19|13|geuligo hananim-egyeseo jaaewa-eunchong-eul bad-ass-euni geuneun gyeong-geonha-eossdeo la
19|14|geuui bumo-egedo sunjong hayeoss go ttohan geuneun geomanhajido ani ha yeoss-eumyeo omanhamdo eobs-eossnola
19|15|geuga tansaenghan nalgwa geuga imjonghaneun nalgwa geuga buhwalhaneun nal-e geu ege pyeonghwaga iss-eul geos-ila
19|16|seongseoe issneun geudaelo malia e gwanhayeo iyagihala geunyeoga ga jog-eul dugo dongjjog eoneu gos-eulo tteo nassdeon yaegiinila
19|17|geudeul-i boji ani hadolog geunyeoga eolgul-eul galiwoss-eul ttae hananim-i geu nyeoege cheonsaleul bonaeni geuneun geunyeo ap-e salangcheoleom natanassdeola
19|18|ittae geunyeoga jeoneun jabilou sin hananimkke guwonhanaida sillo dangsin-i gyeong-geonhan jalamyeon jeoleul haechi ji masoseo lago malhamae
19|19|geuga malhagil sillo naneun dang sin junim-ui sajalosseo seongseuleoun a deul-ui sosig-eul jeonhagi wihae wassnola haneo
19|20|geunyeoga malhagil eoneu namjado jeoleul jeobchoghaji anihaessgo ttohan bu jeong-eul jeojileujido ani haessneunde eo tteohge jega adeul-eul gajil su issseubni kka

19|21|ie geuga malhagil geuleohge doe lila dangsin-ui junimkkeseo geugeos-eun nae ge swiun il-ila geulohayeogeum baegseong eul wihan yejeung-i doege hago hananim ui eunhyega doedolog imi geuleohge myeong hayeojin il-ieossnola
